snippet: The Getty Foundation is announcing the 40 grant recipients for its $5 million Latin American art project.
abstract: Getty Foundation plans to announce its first round of grant recipients for its new project, Pacific Standard Time: LA/LA, which is designed to cultivate broader interest in Latin American art; will give 40 recipients total of $5 million.
lead_paragraph: The Getty Foundation is announcing the 40 grant recipients for its $5 million Latin American art project.

headline.main: Getty to Jump-Start Latin American Art Research in California
headline.print_headline: Latin American Art Receives Support From Getty
